thread.title: Ryan Bilodeau Launches Tech Corner App
thread.title_full: Ryan Bilodeau Launches Tech Corner App

author: prbuzz.com
title: Ryan Bilodeau Launches Tech Corner App
text:
Chicago, Illinois - Software engineer Ryan Bilodeau has announced the launch of his brand new app. The Ryan Bilodeau Tech Corner app will allow virtually anyone with a handheld Android device can take advantage of direct access to the tech industry’s breaking news.
Through his website, Bilodeau offers late-breaking software and tech news through his blog. With the launch of the app, people can access this news on-the-go. His exclusive blog content will be available via the Ryan Bilodeau Tech Corner app.
Regarding the app, Bilodeau said, “We have decided to launch a Ryan Bilodeau Tech Corner app that will give you direct access to my blog content.”
Through the blog, Bilodeau discusses contemporary technology and software engineering topics with articles such as “The Future Of Software Engineering”, “Internet Lists”, “Keeping Up With Our Cell Phone Battery”, “Google's iOS Update For Chrome Is More Connected Than Ever”, “OnePlus 2 Lauded For new Phone”, and “Dislike Button Comes To Facebook”.
The Android app can be found at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RyanBilodeauTechColumn&hl=en?
About Ryan Bilodeau
Ryan Bilodeau is a software engineer based in Chicago, Illinois, offering the most leading-edge knowledge and capabilities to clients around the world.
